Title: Electricity baseload too high
Description: Compares average electricity baseload over last year with benchmarks from other schools
Analysis: Compare average electricity baseload over last year with benchmarks from other schools

Title: Electricity baseload has changed
Description: Compares this week's electricity baseload with average baseload over the year
Analysis: Compare this week's electricity baseload with average baseload over the year

Title: Electricity consumption has changed
Description: Compares this week's electricity consumption with the week before
Analysis: Compares this week's electricity consumption with the week before

Title: Electricity out of hours usage too high
Description: Compares this year's out of hours (holidays, weekends, evenings) electricity consumption with benchmarks from other schools
Analysis: Compares this year's out of hours electricity usage as a percent with benchmarks from other schools

Title: Gas out of hours usage too high
Description: Compares this year's out of hours (holidays, weekends, evenings) gas consumption with benchmarks from other schools
Analysis: Compares this year's out of hours gas  usage as a percent with benchmarks from other schools

Title: Electricity usage high
Description: Compares this year's electricity usage with benchmarks from other schools on both per floor area and per pupil basis
Analysis: Compares this year's electricity usage with benchmarks from other schools on both per floor area and per pupil basis

Title: Gas usage high
Description: Compares this year's gas usage with benchmarks from other schools on both per floor area and per pupil basis
Analysis: Compares this year's gas usage with benchmarks from other schools on both per floor area and per pupil basis

Title: Gas consumption has changed
Description: Compares this week's gas consumption with the week before automatically adjusting for outside temperatures
Analysis: Compares this week's gas consumption with the week before (automatically adjusting the comparison to account for changes in external ambient temperatures

Title: Weekend gas consumption
Analysis: Reports weekend gas consumption above a threshold accounting for the impact of boiler frost protection

Title: Holiday coming up
Description: Notifies you if a holiday is coming up and suggests a list of appliances/boilers to switch off
Analysis: Notifies the school a holiday is coming up and suggests a list of appliances/boilers to switch off

Title: Turn heating on/off
Description: Looks at next 10 days weather forecast for the local area and notifies you if it is warm enough to turn the heating off, or cold enough for it to be turned on
Analysis: Looks at next 10 days weather forecast for the local area and notifies school if it is warm enough to turn the heating off next week, or cold enough for it to be turned on

Title: Hot water efficiency
Description: Compares your school's hot water efficiency with benchmarks
Analysis: Compares the school's hot water efficiency with benchmarks

Title: Heating coming on too early in the morning
Description: Reports  if your heating is coming on too early in the morning
Analysis: Calculates when the heating has come on on average for the latest day for which we have smart meter data and reports if it has come on too early accounting for frost protection

Title: Thermostatic Control
Description: Notifies you how well your school's thermostats are controlling the heating over the last year
Analysis: Calculates how good the schools thermostatic control was over the last  year, and makes recommendations
